meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to blow (of the wind) あの日は強い風が吹いていました。There was a strong wind that day.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to blow (one's breath); to breathe out; to blow on (hot tea, candles, etc.); to puff ローズはしゃぼん玉を吹いていた。Rose was blowing bubbles.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to play (a wind instrument); to blow (a whistle, trumpet, etc.); to whistle (a tune) テッドはトランペットを吹くのが好きです。Ted likes playing the trumpet.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to emit (smoke, fire, etc.); to spout; to spew; to puff out See also 噴く

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to sprout; to put forth (buds) 木が芽をふいている。The trees are shooting out buds.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to appear (on the surface); to form; to be coated with (powder, rust, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to burst out laughing; to burst into laughter Slang, See also 吹き出す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to brag; to talk big

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to smelt; to mint

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to blow in (of wind, rain, etc.) 新鮮な空気が吹き込んでくる。Fresh air is blowing in.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to blow (air) into (e.g. a balloon); to breathe (new life) into 船長は疲れている乗組員に新たな活力を吹き込んだ。The captain breathed new life into his tired crew.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to inspire (someone) with; to put into someone's head; to instill; to infuse; to indoctrinate with 彼は自信を吹き込んでくれた。He inspired me with confidence.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to record (audio; on tape, vinyl, etc.)
吹込む 【ふきこむ】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to smoke (a cigarette, pipe, etc.); to puff on; to puff out (smoke) 私はパイプを吹かしながら座っていた。I sat smoking a pipe.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to rev (an engine); to race See also エンジンを吹かす彼は車をバックでガレージに入れようとして、間違ってエンジンを吹かしてしまい壁にぶつけてしまった。When he tried to back into the garage, he mistakenly gunned the engine and backed into the wall.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to put on (an air of); to act in a ... way; to behave as; to play (the role of) See also 先輩風を吹かす, as ...風を〜

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to shoot (a ball) too high; to blast over the bar Sports, Usually written using kana alone, See also シュートをふかす
